data.title: Clement Giraudet Celebrity News and Gossip
data.text:
Robin Wright and husband Clement Giraudet have split.

The 56-year-old House of Cards actress filed for divorce on Thursday (September 22) after four years of marriage.

Robin and Clement, an exec at Saint Laurent, got married in a secret ceremony in August 2018 and there were photos of the former couple packing on the PDA during a honeymoon at the beach in Spain.

Click inside for details on the breakup… More Here! »

Robin Wright goes for a ride on her E-bike with her husband Clement Giraudet on Saturday (November 28) in Brentwood, Calif.

The 54-year-old actress and the 36-year-old fashion exec were seen riding specialized Turbo E-Bikes for their ride around the neighborhood.

PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Robin Wright

Robin and Clement were spotted on many bike rides and walks at the start of the pandemic, though it’s been a while since there have been new photos of the married couple.

Check out the hot pics of Clement going shirtless and showing off his ripped, muscular body on one of those strolls!

Robin and Clement got married back in the summer of 2018. He is the VIP relations manager for the fashion brand Saint Laurent.

20+ pictures inside of Robin Wright and Clement Giraudet on a bike ride… More Here! »

Robin Wright and husband Clement Giraudet share some kisses in the surf while enjoying a fun day in the sun on Friday (June 12) in Malibu, Calif.

The 54-year-old House of Cards actress was also joined by some friends for the surf session that day.

PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Robin Wright

Clement, a fashion executive, was spotted going shirtless while packing up their car with the surfboards after they finished up. Make sure to check out our last post on Clement to see the super hot photos of him going shirtless and putting his buff body on display.

Last month, Robin was spotted running into another famous friend while doing errands around town.

50+ pictures inside of Robin Wright and Clement Giraudet at the beach… More Here! »

Clement Giraudet puts his hot body on display while going for a walk in the park with his dog on Sunday (May 10) in Pacific Palisades, Calif.

The hunky fashion exec is married to actress Robin Wright and they have been spotted many times together throughout the quarantine during their frequent walks and bike rides. See some more pics of them at the beach!

PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Clement Giraudet

Clement is the worldwide VIP Relations Manager for fashion brand Saint Laurent and he has been married to Robin since 2018.

See who Clement and Robin spent the day with on Saturday. He’s someone who once was very close to her and is still a part of her life!

30+ pictures inside of Clement Giraudet on his dog walk… More Here! »

Robin Wright celebrated her Mother’s Day (May 10) with some family time at the beach this weekend in Los Angeles.

The 54-year-old actress chilled out on the sand after helping daughter Dylan Penn into a wetsuit as she took to the waves for a bit of surfing.

PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Robin Wright

Robin‘s husband, Clement Giraudet, was also seen hanging out with the mother-daughter duo after walking their dog around the neighborhood.

A few days earlier, Robin and Dylan were seen meeting up with Dylan‘s dad, Sean Penn, at the beach as well.

Sean Penn and Robin Wright might not be together anymore, but they’re still a family!

The 59-year-old two-time Oscar winner and their daughter Dylan Penn were spotted arriving at the beach for a family picnic on Saturday afternoon (May 9) in Malibu, Calif.

PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Sean Penn

A little while later, the 54-year-old actress and husband Clement Giraudet arrived at the beach carrying some snacks and a surfboard.

Sean has been very busy during this past few weeks while helping out during the global health pandemic.

Late last month, it was revealed that Sean‘s nonprofit organization while be expanding their free testing sites.
